section.heading: Mayor to invest or deposit certain funds.

annoGroup.heading: Delegation of Authority
annoGroup.annotation: Delegation of authority under Law 5-50, see Mayor’s Order 84-82, May 4,1984.

Delegation of authority under D.C. Law 9-185, “Public Funds Investment Policy in Financial Institutions and Companies Making Loans to or Doing Business with Northern Ireland Amendment Act of 1992”, see Mayor’s Order 93-76, June 16, 1993.

annoGroup.heading: Editor's Notes
annoGroup.annotation: Companies and their subsidiaries or affiliates doing business in or with the Republic of South Africa or Namibia: See Mayor’s Order 90-115, August 14, 1990 and Mayor’s Order 90-189, November 30, 1990.
